sections.name: Mert Ahmet Güneş
sections.highlight: Experienced Senior iOS Application Developer who has an obsession with delivering pixel perfect applications that provides the best user experience possible.

values.title: Senior iOS Developer
highlights: Working as a consultant as the only iOS Developer in the company.
Worked on one in-house project and served to four customers so far, including {link-0}, Mobimeo GmbH, {link-1} and IKEA Group.

values.title: Senior iOS Developer (Consultant)
highlights: Working with a team of 8 iOS developers on IKEA Group’s new store application which will be used worldwide.
Focusing on product details, search & browse and first time experience flows.
Codebase is a mixture of Objective-C & Swift.

values.title: Senior iOS Developer & Team Lead (Consultant)
highlights: Led the iOS team of Search and Ticketing modules of a white label public transportation project.
Development language was Swift with the help of RxSwift, Carthage and MVVM-C.

values.title: Senior iOS Developer
highlights: Worked for 8 startup projects focused mainly on social media, IoT (smart home), dating and stock trading.
Developed all codebases from scratch by taking part in almost every phase of the process from product discovery to project delivery.
Organised monthly events of an organisation named {link-4}
Worked with Swift (since 2.2) mainly and Objective-C.

values.title: Junior iOS Developer
highlights: Took part on three projects focused mainly on utilities, stock trading and plane ticketing.

values.title: Junior iOS Developer
highlights: Worked on 10+ projects mainly focused on stock trading.
